name: canvas-sprite-player
description: A canvas sprite engine/player that contains play and pause functionality as well as custom events.

scripts.production: npm run min --silent && npm run version:append --silent
scripts.version:append:
echo "/*! Canvas Sprite Player v - $(npm run version:extract --silent)
 * Â© Phillip Dodson
 * Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S')
 */
$(cat sprite-player.min.js)" > sprite-player.min.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
